item.title: A story about another Star
item.summary: Various statements are given with regard to the nature and movements of the celestial bodies. The first of these treats of the Moon and Stars, ending with the 'Bushmanâ€“rice' Star Canopus (B I. 291-294). A female Star who is red marries a male Star who is also red, and they have a Star child. This is because they are the Stars.
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book II-2
item.author: ||kabbo (Jantje) (II)
